EmailTemplate.subject: Love managing projects? - Apply to be a Project Manager at The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
New permanent job opportunity!
Want the satisfaction of being one of the team to make it all happen?
If you have loved working on NCS with The Challenge in a seasonal role then what about working for us all year round?
We are currently looking for new core staff to work in our central London office at a Management level.
The role we are currently promoting is:-
NCS Assistant Project Manger (Staffing Associate Manager) - if you love making things tick by planning and implementing projects and you get a buzz out of knowing that what you do will benefit the thousands of people who apply for roles with us, then this is the role for you!
To see the full role description follow the link here. https://staffing.the-challenge.org/assets/Central_Staffing_Associate_Manager_January_2014_(1).pdf
Please send your application to Alison Ovens on centraljobs.staffing@the-challenge.org
For other permanent roles at www.the-challenge.org/year-round-roles. Please go to the role that is of interest, and apply to the appropriate contact.
We look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Alison NCS with The Challenge CCR 23
